026     private static final String ILLEGAL_FILE_NAME_CHARACTERS = new String(
027         new char[] { '/', '\n', '\r', '\t', '\0', '\f', '`', '?', '*', '\\', '<', '>', '|', '\"', ':' }
028         );

042     public static void deleteDirectoryRecursivelyE(File dir)
043     {
044         if (!dir.isDirectory()) throw new RuntimeException("Not a directory: " + dir.getAbsolutePath());
045 
046         for (File f : dir.listFiles()) {
047             if (f.isDirectory()) {
048                 deleteDirectoryRecursivelyE(f);
049             } else {
050                 if (!f.delete()) throw new RuntimeException("Failed to delete file: " + f.getAbsolutePath());
051             }
052         }
053         if (!dir.delete()) throw new RuntimeException("Failed to delete directory: " + dir.getAbsolutePath());
054     }
055 
056     public static Writer close(Writer w)
057     {
058         if (w != null) {
059             try {
060                 w.close();
061             } catch (Exception ee) {
062             }
063         }
064         return null;
065     }
066

069         if (w != null) {
070             try {
071                 w.close();
072             } catch (Exception ee) {
073             }
074         }
075         return null;
076     }

094             } catch (Exception ee) {
095             }
096         }
097         return null;

100     public static ArrayList<String> loadFileAsList(String filePath)
101         throws IOException
102     {
103         return loadFileAsList(new File(filePath));
104     }
105 
106     public static ArrayList<String> loadFileAsList(File file)
107         throws IOException
108     {
109         FileReader fr = null;
110         try {
111             ArrayList<String> lineList = new ArrayList<String>();
112 
113             fr = new FileReader(file);
114             BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(fr);
115             String line;
116             while ((line = br.readLine()) != null) {
117                 lineList.add(line);
118             }
119 
120             return lineList;
121         } finally {
122             if (fr != null) {
123                 try {
124                     fr.close();
125                 } catch (Exception ee) {
126                 }
127             }
128         }
129     }
130 
131     public static String loadFileAsText(String filePath)
132         throws IOException
133     {
134         return loadFileAsText(new File(filePath));
135     }
136 
137     public static String detectEncoding(File file)
138         throws IOException
139     {
140         InputStream fin = null;
141         try {
142             fin = new FileInputStream(file);
143 
144             byte[] buffer = new byte[3];
145             int bytesRead = fin.read(buffer, 0, 3);
146             if (bytesRead >= 2) {
147                 if ((buffer[0] == -2) && (buffer[1] == -1)) return "UTF-16BE";
148                 if ((buffer[0] == -1) && (buffer[1] == -2)) return "UTF-16LE";
149                 if (bytesRead == 3) {
150                     if ((buffer[0] == (byte)239) && (buffer[1] == (byte)187) && (buffer[1] == (byte)191)) return "UTF-8";
151                 }
152                 XUtils.noop();
153                 return null;
154             } else {
155                 return null;
156             }
157 
158         } finally {
159             if (fin != null) {
160                 try {
161                     fin.close();
162                 } catch (Exception ee) {
163                 }
164             }
165         }
166     }
167 
168     public static String loadFileAsText(File file)
169         throws IOException
170     {
171         InputStream fin = null;
172         try {
173             String encoding = detectEncoding(file);
174 
175             StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
176             fin = new FileInputStream(file);
177             InputStreamReader isr;
178             if (encoding == null) {
179                 isr = new InputStreamReader(fin);
180             } else {
181                 isr = new InputStreamReader(fin, encoding);
182             }
183 
184             char[] cbuf = new char[65536];
185             while (true) {
186                 int charsRead = isr.read(cbuf);
187                 if (charsRead < 0) break;
188                 sb.append(cbuf, 0, charsRead);
189             }
190 
191             return sb.toString();
192         } finally {
193             if (fin != null) {
194                 try {
195                     fin.close();
196                 } catch (Exception ee) {
197                 }
198             }
199         }
200     }
201 
202     public static byte[] loadFileAsBinary(String filePath)
203         throws IOException
204     {
205         return loadFileAsBinary(new File(filePath));
206     }
207 
208     public static byte[] loadFileAsBinary(File file)
209         throws IOException
210     {
211         FileInputStream fr = null;
212         try {
213             ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
214 
215             fr = new FileInputStream(file);
216             long len = file.length();
217             byte[] buffer = new byte[1024 * 256];
218             while (len > 0) {
219                 int bytesRead = fr.read(buffer);
220                 if (bytesRead < 0) throw new IOException("Failed to read data!");
221                 if (bytesRead > 0) {
222                     baos.write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);
223                     len -= bytesRead;
224                 }
225             }
226 
227             return baos.toByteArray();
228         } finally {
229             if (fr != null) {
230                 try {
231                     fr.close();
232                 } catch (Exception ee) {
233                 }
234             }
235         }
236     }

238     public static void saveFile(String textData, String filePath)
239         throws IOException
240     {
241         saveFile(textData, new File(filePath));

244     public static void saveFile(String textData, File file)
245         throws IOException
246     {
247         FileWriter fw = null;
248         try {
249             fw = new FileWriter(file);
250             fw.write(textData);
251         } finally {
252             if (fw != null) {
253                 try {
254                     fw.close();
255                 } catch (Exception ee) {
256                 }
257             }
258         }
259     }

264         saveFile(lineList, new File(filePath));

267     public static void saveFile(String[] lineList, String filePath)
268         throws IOException
269     {
270         saveFile(lineList, new File(filePath));
271     }
272 
273     public static void saveFile(ArrayList<String> lineList, File file)
274         throws IOException
275     {
276         FileWriter fw = null;
277         BufferedWriter bw = null;
278         try {
279             fw = new FileWriter(file);
280             bw = new BufferedWriter(fw);
281 
282             for (String line : lineList) {
283                 bw.write(line);
284                 bw.write(TextUtils.CRLF);
285             }
286 
287         } finally {
288             if (bw != null) {
289                 try {
290                     bw.close();
291                 } catch (Exception ee) {
292                 }
293                 fw = null;
294             }
295             if (fw != null) {
296                 try {
297                     fw.close();
298                 } catch (Exception ee) {
299                 }
300             }
301         }
302     }
303 
304     public static void saveFile(String[] lineList, File file)
305         throws IOException
306     {
307         FileWriter fw = null;
308         BufferedWriter bw = null;
309         try {
310             fw = new FileWriter(file);
311             bw = new BufferedWriter(fw);
312 
313             for (String line : lineList) {
314                 bw.write(line);
315                 bw.write(TextUtils.CRLF);
316             }
317 
318         } finally {
319             if (bw != null) {
320                 try {
321                     bw.close();
322                 } catch (Exception ee) {
323                 }
324                 fw = null;
325             }
326             if (fw != null) {
327                 try {
328                     fw.close();
329                 } catch (Exception ee) {
330                 }
331             }
332         }
333     }

335     public static String removeInvalidFileNameChars(String fileName)
336     {
337         StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
338 
339         for (char c : fileName.toCharArray()) {
340             if (ILLEGAL_FILE_NAME_CHARACTERS.indexOf(c) < 0) {
341                 sb.append(c);
342             }
343         }
344 
345         return sb.toString();
346     }
347 
348     public static void saveFile(byte[] data, File file) throws IOException
349     {
350         FileOutputStream fout = null;
351         try {
352             fout = new FileOutputStream(file, false);
353             fout.write(data);
354         } finally {
355             if (fout != null) {
356                 try {
357                     fout.close();
358                 } catch (Exception ee) {
359                 }
360             }
361         }
362     }

364     public static void ensureDirExists(String dirPath) throws IOException
365     {
366         File dir = new File(dirPath);
367         ensureDirExists(dir);
368     }
369 
370     public static void ensureDirExists(File dir) throws IOException
371     {
372         if (dir.exists()) {
373             if (!dir.isDirectory())
374                 throw new IOException("This is not a directory: " + dir);
375             return;
376         }
377         try {
378             dir.mkdirs();
379         } catch (Exception ee) {
380             throw new IOException("Failed to create directory: " + dir.getAbsolutePath(), ee);
381         }
382     }
383 
384     public static String addSeparatorChar(String path)
385     {
386         if (path.endsWith("" + File.separatorChar)) return path;
387         return path + File.separatorChar;
388     }
389 
390     public static String removeFileExtension(String path)
391     {
392         String dirPath;
393         String fileName;
394         int pos = XUtils.max(path.lastIndexOf('/'), path.lastIndexOf('\\'));
395         if (pos >= 0) {
396             dirPath = path.substring(0, pos + 1);
397             fileName = path.substring(pos + 1);
398         } else {
399             fileName = path;
400             dirPath = "";
401         }
402 
403         String fileNameWithoutExt;
404         String ext;
405         pos = fileName.lastIndexOf('.');
406         if (pos < 0) {
407             fileNameWithoutExt = fileName;
408             ext = null;
409         } else {
410             fileNameWithoutExt = fileName.substring(0, pos);
411             ext = fileName.substring(pos);
412         }
413 
414         return dirPath + fileNameWithoutExt;
415     }
416 
417     public static String extractFileNameWithoutExtension(String path)
418     {
419         String fileName;
420         int pos = XUtils.max(path.lastIndexOf('/'), path.lastIndexOf('\\'));
421         if (pos >= 0) {
422             fileName = path.substring(pos + 1);
423         } else {
424             fileName = path;
425         }
426 
427         String fileNameWithoutExt;
428         pos = fileName.lastIndexOf('.');
429         if (pos < 0) {
430             fileNameWithoutExt = fileName;
431         } else {
432             fileNameWithoutExt = fileName.substring(0, pos);
433         }
434 
435         return fileNameWithoutExt;
436     }
437 
438     public static String getFileExtension(String path)
439     {
440         String fileName;
441         int pos = XUtils.max(path.lastIndexOf('/'), path.lastIndexOf('\\'));
442         if (pos >= 0) {
443             fileName = path.substring(pos + 1);
444         } else {
445             fileName = path;
446         }
447 
448         pos = fileName.lastIndexOf('.');
449         if (pos < 0) {
450             return null;
451         } else {
452             return fileName.substring(pos + 1);
453         }
454     }
455 
456     public static String makeFileName(String fileName)
457     {
458         if (fileName == null) return null;
459 
460         StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
461         for (char c : fileName.toCharArray()) {
462             if ("\\/:;<>|\"?".indexOf(c) >= 0) {
463             } else {
464                 sb.append(c);
465             }
466         }
467         return sb.toString();
468     }
469 
470     public static void copyFiles(File sourceDir, File destDir) throws IOException
471     {
472         for (File f : sourceDir.listFiles()) {
473             copyFile(f, new File(destDir, f.getName()));
474         }
475     }
476 
477     public static void copyFile(File sourceFile, File destFile) throws IOException
478     {
479         byte[] data = loadFileAsBinary(sourceFile);
480         saveFile(data, destFile);
481     }
482 
483     public static File copyFileToDirEx(File sourceFile, File destDir) throws IOException
484     {
485         if (!sourceFile.isFile()) throw new IOException("Source file is not a file!");
486         if (!destDir.isDirectory()) throw new IOException("Destination is not a directory!");
487 
488         File destFile = new File(destDir, sourceFile.getName());
489         if (destFile.exists()) {
490             if ((destFile.length() == sourceFile.length())
491                 && (destFile.lastModified() == sourceFile.lastModified())) return destFile;
492         }
493 
494         IOUtils.copyFile(sourceFile, destFile);
495         destFile.setLastModified(sourceFile.lastModified());
496 
497         return destFile;
498     }
499 
500     public static File copyFileEx(File sourceFile, File destFile) throws IOException
501     {
502         if (!sourceFile.isFile()) throw new IOException("Source file is not a file!");
503         if (destFile.isDirectory()) throw new IOException("Destination is a directory!");
504 
505         if (destFile.exists()) {
506             if ((destFile.length() == sourceFile.length())
507                 && (destFile.lastModified() == sourceFile.lastModified())) return destFile;
508         }
509 
510         IOUtils.copyFile(sourceFile, destFile);
511         destFile.setLastModified(sourceFile.lastModified());
512         return destFile;
513     }
514 
515     public static String makeAbsolutePath(String basePath, String path)
516     {
517         if (basePath == null) {
518             Path myPath = FileSystems.getDefault().getPath(path);
519             return myPath.normalize().toAbsolutePath().toString();
520         } else {
521             Path base = FileSystems.getDefault().getPath(basePath);
522             Path resolved = base.resolve(path);
523             return resolved.normalize().toAbsolutePath().toString();
524         }
525     }
